briefdescription.para: Type representing the parameter vector of the nonlinear operator.
Constructor for NewtonRaphson.

parameterdescription.para: Nonlinear operator to solve.
Linear solver used internally (default is SolverDefault).
Update function (default is UpdateDefault).

briefdescription.para: Set up the solver with the given settings.

parameterdescription.para: Newton-Raphson settings.

briefdescription.para: Solve the nonlinear system.

parameterdescription.para: Predictor for the solution increment (default is NoPredictor).

briefdescription.para: Access the nonlinear operator.
Subscribe an observer to receive notifications for a specific message type.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to subscribe to.
The observer to be subscribed.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe an observer to receive notifications for all message types.

parameterdescription.para: The observer to be subscribed.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe multiple observers to receive notifications for all message types.

parameterdescription.para: List of observers to be subscribed.

briefdescription.para: Unsubscribe an observer from receiving notifications for a specific message type.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to unsubscribe from.
The observer to be unsubscribed.

briefdescription.para: Unsubscribe an observer from receiving notifications for all message types.

parameterdescription.para: The observer to be unsubscribed.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to notify about.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with a floating-point value.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the floating-point value.
The message type to notify about.
The floating-point value to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with an integer value.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to notify about.
The integer value to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with a string value.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to notify about.
The string value to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with an integer and a double value.

parameterdescription.para: The message type to notify about.
The integer value to be sent with the notification.
The double value to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with an integer value and a string value.

The integer value to be sent with the notification.
The string value to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Notify observers about a specific message type with an Eigen::VectorX.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the elements in the Eigen::VectorX.
The message type to notify about.
The Eigen::VectorX to be sent with the notification.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of the Newton-Raphson method for solving nonlinear equations.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the nonlinear operator to solve.
Type of the linear solver used internally (default is SolverDefault).
Type of the update function (default is UpdateDefault).
